mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.actionType actionType, t.ACCOUNT_ID accountId, t.fund_type fundType, t.amount amount, t.currency currency, t.CREATE_TIME createTime, t.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, t.thirdparty_type thirdPartyType, t.order_no orderNo, t.sumary sumary, t.O_ACCOUNT_ID oAccountId, t.token token, t.s_order_no sOrderNo, t.cust_id custId, t.lend_no lendNo, t.to_cust_id toCustId, t.to_lend_no toLendNo, t.loan_cust_id loanCustId, t.loan_no loanNo, t.new_fund_type newFundType, t.trade_type tradeType FROM t_gq_fund_sequence t
mapper.select:
SELECT s.fund_type as fundType, s.amount as amount, date_format(s.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%m') as create_time, date_format(s.create_time,'%Y-%m') as create_ym From t_gq_fund_account a,t_gq_fund_sequence s WHERE a.id = s.account_id and (a.busi_type=3 or a.busi_type=99) and a.user_id=${user_no}
AND s.fund_type in(1003,1012)
AND s.fund_type in(1001,1002)
AND s.fund_type =3001
AND s.fund_type =4010
AND s.fund_type in(3005,3006)

SELECT a.cust_id custId, a.amount amount, a.freeze_amount freezeAmount, a.account_type accountType, a.busi_type busiType, a.CREATE_TIME create_time, a.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, a.account_no accountNo, a.cust_name userName, a.has_Third_Account hasThirdAccount, a.city_id cityId, a.bankNo bankNo, s.fund_type fundType, s.actionType actionType From t_gq_fund_account a,t_gq_fund_sequence s WHERE a.id = s.account_id AND (a.busi_type=3 or a.busi_type=99)
AND a.account_no like CONCAT('%',#{accountNo},'%')
SELECT count(*) From t_gq_fund_sequence t where t.order_no=#{orderNo}
SELECT count(*) From t_gq_fund_sequence t where t.s_order_no=#{sOrderNo}

select (select IFNULL(SUM(t.amount),0.00) from t_gq_fund_sequence t,t_gq_fund_account a where t.ACCOUNT_ID=a.id and a.cust_id=#{custId} and a.busi_type=3 and t.fund_type in(1001,1002) and date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')) rechargeTotal, (select IFNULL(-SUM(t.`amount`),0.00) from t_gq_fund_sequence t,t_gq_fund_account a where t.ACCOUNT_ID=a.id and a.cust_id=#{custId} and a.busi_type=3 and t.fund_type =2003 and date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')) withdrawTotal
